MotiveQuest LinkedIn Profile]| }} '''MotiveQuest''' is a [[market research]] business uncovering intelligence and insights from social big data (e.g., online conversations on Facebook, Twitter, blogs, forums). The company uses proprietary data, software analytics tools and a human workforce of market research strategists. The company's products assist Fortune 500 brands with their category insights, branding, advertising, product innovation, customer satisfaction and social media decisions. ==History and Overview== MotiveQuest was founded in 2003 by David Rabjohns, formerly an EVP at [[Leo Burnett Worldwide]]. MotiveQuest is headquartered in Evanston, IL, and maintains offices in New York, NY and Portland, OR. The company was one of the early pioneers in the study of Online Anthropology, uncovering the core human motivations to "why" people say the things they do online, as opposed to simply "what" they are saying online. ==Leadership== *David Rabjohns, Founder and CEO *Kirsten Recknagel, COO *Brook Miller, CTO *Zack Nippert, CMO ==Recognition and Awards== In 2009, a Gold Award from the Jay Chiat Awards for Strategic Excellence, conferred by the [[American Association of Advertising Agencies]].
